scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run build-html && yarn run build-css && yarn run build-media
scripts.build-css: sass --no-source-map src/css/style.scss build/style.css && purgecss --config purgecss.config.js --css build/style.css --content 'build/**/*.html' --output build && csso build/style.css --force-media-merge --output build/style.css
scripts.deploy: yarn run build && node -r dotenv/config scripts/deploy.js
scripts.fix: concurrently --raw 'yarn run fix-css' 'yarn run fix-js' 'prettier --loglevel error --write "*.json"'
scripts.reset: yarn run clean && rimraf node_modules yarn.lock && yarn install
scripts.start: yarn run build && concurrently --raw 'yarn run serve' 'open-cli http://0.0.0.0:4242'
scripts.watch: yarn run clean && concurrently --raw 'yarn run serve' 'yarn run watch-css' 'yarn run watch-html' 'yarn run watch-media'
